channel.title: vpn-tor-vpn anonymity
channel.description: When using the vpn - tor - vpn chain (first vpn on host - whonix gateway with kali on virtualbox, second vpn on kali), the second vpn sees only the output tor node, but does not see which second node transmitted this traffic, is it correct? Also, the second vpn does not see the first node, the first vpn and the sender, right?

item.title: vpn-tor-vpn anonymity
item.dc:creator: madaidan
item.description:
I highly recommend against this. This will get rid of many protections that Tor gives you.

See:
https://matt.traudt.xyz/p/mRikAa4h.html - From a Tor developer.

Also, you will stand out from nearly every other Tor user which to a network-level adversaryâ€™s view will make you stand out and easier to track.

Read full topic

item.title: vpn-tor-vpn anonymity
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Xileriga:

is it correct? Also, the second vpn does not see the first node, the first vpn and the sender, right?

Yes and yes.

Read full topic
